content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts scenes of suicide, homicides occur, madness and insanity. It also depicts the use of drugs and other stimulants, and brutality. It has frightening scenes and a dark plot. There are also plot references to prostitution with images of women in underwear.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 / Mint 20.3
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 / Mint 20.3+
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950 or better
